00016 #if !defined(XALANXMLCHAR_HEADER_GUARD_1357924680)
00017 #define XALANXMLCHAR_HEADER_GUARD_1357924680

00020 
00021 // Base include file.  Must be first.
00022 #include <xalanc/PlatformSupport/PlatformSupportDefinitions.hpp>
00023 
00024 
00025 
00026 XALAN_CPP_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
00027 
00028 
00029 
00030 struct XALAN_PLATFORMSUPPORT_EXPORT XalanXMLChar
00031 {
00032 
00033 public:
00034 
00035     enum eType
00036     {
00037         XML_XX = 0,
00038         XML_BC = 1,
00039         XML_ID = 2,
00040         XML_EX = 3,
00041         XML_DI = 4,
00042         XML_CC = 5,
00043         XML_WS = 6
00044     };
00045 
00046     static const char theUnicodeTable[];
00047 
00048     static bool 
00049     isBaseChar(XalanDOMChar c)
00050     {
00051         return theUnicodeTable[c] == char(XML_BC);
00052     }
00053 
00054     static bool 
00055     isIdeographic(XalanDOMChar c)
00056     {
00057         return theUnicodeTable[c] == char(XML_ID);
00058     }
00059 
00060     static bool 
00061     isExtender(XalanDOMChar c) 
00062     {
00063         return theUnicodeTable[c] == char(XML_EX);
00064     }
00065 
00066     static bool 
00067     isDigit(XalanDOMChar c) 
00068     {
00069         return theUnicodeTable[c] == char(XML_DI);
00070     }
00071 
00072     static bool 
00073     isCombiningChar(XalanDOMChar c) 
00074     {
00075         return theUnicodeTable[c] == char(XML_CC);
00076     }
00077 
00078     static bool 
00079     isWhitespace(XalanDOMChar c) 
00080     {
00081         return theUnicodeTable[c] == char(XML_WS);
00082     }
00083 
00084     static bool 
00085     isLetter(XalanDOMChar c) 
00086     {
00087         return theUnicodeTable[c] == char(XML_BC) || theUnicodeTable[c] == char(XML_ID);
00088     }
00089 };
00090 
00091 
00092 
00093 XALAN_CPP_NAMESPACE_END
